channel.title: Charlotte
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Rachel
item.description:
Rachel is Olivia's companion, they live together. Rachel is dependent on Olivia, even though Olivia started to force her to do things by herself. She also has caretakers that help her in her life and help her become more independent, so she's not entirely dependent on Olivia!She's very artistic and do both paper drawings and photoshop stuff ! She would love to work in a pet shop.
She has a headmate that isn't sure about their name, but is called something like ''Ben''.She likes the pilot version of twilight sparkle, the diamond drawing is her cutie mark.Her favorite song is ''The devil within''. It's a little creepy. But sounds nice !She loves birds.Her tulpas suddenly disappeared into another world, and she misses them very much. 2025-01-29 / 19:41
She also has a headmate that went away but came back recently called Tim.
Rachel has a problem with self harming. But she promised not to do it again. She asked me for advice which I gave, and downloaded an app called calm harm which is supposed to help with self harm. She better not to it again because Olivia would get really mad.

item.title: Neutrois_Woman_symbol_colored_main
Neutrois_Woman_symbol_with_flag
How to date Cynder
item.description: Turn on the fan Set some happy piano music

item.title: Cynder
item.description:
Olivia's headmate. She is a dragon from the game Spyro. She is very clever and often misunderstood, people don't read enough of her intents as she writes. She seemed to enjoy talking with Antoine and our co-fronting mixed version of ourselves.[Errata: Since January 2025 they are now officially dating!]
She shared her playlist with us and told us the playlist was updated often with songs that go with her current mood. So we told that we would check it often. Her favorite songs are from Avril Lavigne, she selected ''Smile'' and ''Bad Girl''. She also loves ''Keep holding on'' like everyone here. She is very critical of herself which can be detrimental to her well-being, But i know she can accept the way she is ! She would like to be a detective, which would fit her. Maybe we can think of activities fit for a detective to do together ! I asked her if she'd like escape games and she seemed very interested.
Apparently, she talks in ways that is complicated for Olivia to understand.
[Errata: Thanks to tips Antoine gave her to have more empathy, and because Olivia learnt tricks herself to be "more clever" she has less difficulty understanding Cynder!]
For her birthday, Antoine streamed to her his very first time playing the game that is her source, they both enjoyed it!
She loves the book series "A galactic Bond" and is currently reading it. So we decided, we too, to buy and Read a Galactic Bond on kindle.2025-03-23 / 11:51She seems to feel better about what happened in 2019. She finally accepted that the problems that happened weren't entirely her fault alone which lightened a lot the weight on her shoulders!
How to date Cynder

item.title: Physical exercises
item.description:
2024-12-05 / 16:40Antoine is going to try to do some physical exercise we got told about at the Pokemon Daycare ! At first we'll try the pushups against a wall, the ''superman'', the ''penguin'', then we'll try maybe some harder exercises. The principle is to get it as a habit so we can start doing harder exercises more easily.2025-01-21 / 17:58
Lately antoine found a 12 minutes program of both walking and jogging he can do near the house of Sylvain in the city. It starts with a big climb so he just walks but as fast as his legs can survive it, then there is some plane terrain where he recuperates energy, then the is the descent where he jogs for as long as he can. Keto diet makes it really hard to have stamina, and he has really small muscles, so this is perfect for him. He does this up to 5 times a day.2025-01-24 / 16:21
We decided to slow down exercises after we tried to run three times the big climb. We were a mess the day after. Now, we'll do more responsible exercises. We do some apartment bicycle at the Pokemon Daycare when we are there, and we'll walk the big climb instead of running in it.2025-02-05 / 18:04
We are back at the castle with the threadmill, and today we already did 70 minutes of walking in 10 minutes sessions. The machine says it's already 350 kcal. We try to read on charpter of Read a Galactic Bond then ten minutes. Or do another short activity, then going bacl to ten minutes.2025-03-03 / 18:31We've been walking for a month now. We augmented the incline, went from 4 km/h to 5.5km/h, and ended up under 90 kilos already ! Yeay !2025-03-12 / 13:50We augmented a little the incline again, and the speed to 6km/h. It's getting hard !
For Antoine's birthday, Olivia and Cynder offered him a galaxy fit 3 !

item.title: Olivia
item.description:
She goes to various support groups for trans people, lesbian women... She wants to create a group for plural people.She chose a name from a list of 60 names Rachel gave her. It felt deep, complex, strong, passionate, willful, etc...
She has two tulpas, Cynder and Aera. But Aera kinda lives in another world so they see each other not very often.
Before making Cynder a tulpa, she wanted to create her through mad scientist stuff. Cynder is glad she didn't.Her system is called Olyndra, which is a mix of the headmates name.She has a talent for summarizing situations. It's helpful when you need to take decision. Is pretty fit but has back posture problems.
She had to flee Rachel's parents' home with her because they were abusive, and couldn't come back to her mom's house that was too small, so Olivia has been homeless for a few months living in hotels, then shortly in a shelter. Then they had help to find an apartment in section 8. During that time all of her stuff that was in a storage room disappeared in a fire. She's pretty pissed about the fire.
Me and her are dating and Olivia wants to marry us in the future. It has to do with the Intensity of our love I guess?
Antoine gave her tricks to help her with the lack of empathy she has from her schizo affective disorder, and they seem to work. She then came up with her own tricks to be more understanding of people and more focused on what happens around her.
She is seeking to work to buy a home with us in France. She doesn't use that much money and would gain much more money than us in Seattle.2025-01-26 / 18:03
Changes of plan, she won't have time to work in Seattle because she might be coming in france soon! (3 months).2025-01-28 / 13:11Re changes of plan, she will just visit France and will be coming back to the US a month later.
She wants to come back once she gets 300k‚Ç¨ for a visa for Rachel. Olivia is really optimistic about money, I'm not, and I'm sad.
She gets really mad when Rachel self harms, it could even cause them to break up temporarily or more.... so I don't want that to happen.2025-03-12 / 13:48
For Antoine's birthday, she offered us a gift. A galaxy fit 3 !

item.title: Voice training
item.description:
Amy made me consider voice training to be feminine instead of using Voicemod to have a girly voice online.
Olivia sent me a playlist to train
She said I should work on confidence and resonance after i sent her a bad voice clip.2025-01-26 / 17:36
Next week I'm Coming back to the castle, so it'll be voice training time !2025-02-03 / 13:20the first video had: the breathing exercises ''Ha, Hi, Hai, How" second exercise the "gift" for adam's apple then bug bunny "nyeah" then the ghost then creaky door rusty gate going from creaky door to yawning finding your falsetto with hard r sound Doing breathing exercise followed by a voiced exercise H√©, Hi, Hai, how Doing the same sounds but pinchy annoying
I didn't forget to like the video and now our voice is tired, but it was nice. I'll train a little those sounds before going to the next video in a few days. Melisande heard us training and was really surprised and wondering what we were doing.2025-02-15 / 18:49
Olivia and Me had our first voice chat together on Valentines Day! It was amazing, she helped me with resonance, then said she liked my voice and was really happy, so of course I was really happy too !

item.title: Notes February 2025
item.description:
Added the Read a Galactic Bond on the journal and added context to relative entries. 2025-02-02 / 19:30
Added Coming back to the castle data, Bernardino data and that's basically it. 2025-02-03 / 17:46
Added Voice training data and how Melisande heard us training.
Amy and Chelsea were not doing very well, I hope it's going to be okay.2025-02-04 / 15:35
Mode data on Read a Galactic Bond.
Told Christian we might marry Olivia one day.
Chelsea emitted doubts on our relationship. She doesn't know if dating someone that the rest of her system isn't dating is good for her.
Added data to Physical exercises. 2025-02-07 / 17:19
added AI pictures of Amy's headmates Added small descriptions of some of Amy's headmates. 2025-02-09 / 14:10
Added that we told Antoine's dad that we were plural and that Olivia was too. We continued doing voice training, the basic ones, and physical exercise. 2025-02-15 / 18:48
Yesterday for Valentines Day Me and Olivia had our first voice chat ever! She helped me have a little better voice in Voice training, but said she likes my voice! She was super happy, so it made me super happy too!

item.title: Christian
item.description:
Antoine's Dad.
We told him we might marry Olivia in the future.
We told him Olivia and Antoine were plural. He was like "okay, good to know"

item.title: Lilith
item.description: Ashley's Headmate.

item.title: Lilith
Ashley
item.description:
Sadie on discord and a great friend of Olivia and Rachel.
Cynder confides to her and I guess probably Olivia too.
She wanna come live in Washington with them, and has a crush on Cynder.
She has a headmate: Lilith

item.title: Dahlia
item.description: Amy's headmate. As Amy said, she's explicitly sexual.

item.title: Myna
item.description: Amy's headmate. On the picture she looks a little shy but she's not, it's more a neutral face. She's concerned with basic needs being met, and she's quite unemotional. Her favorite color is white. She's cooperative and can front at will.

item.title: Ronni
item.description: Amy's headmate. He's pretty uncooperative and doesn't like Amy.

item.title: Leaf
item.description: Amy's headmate. Amy says they are fear.They like the dark and horror. They could front at will.

item.title: Dahlia
Leaf
Luna
item.description: Amy's headmate.

item.title: Luna
Myna
Ronni
Rosade
item.description: They are they/them, and a tulpa of Amy. Was first acknowledged to be called Argent, then Berry, then Rosade. But they might have been there before that ! They could have been Cylva, who was their own tulpa before, but it's not entirely sure, they have a lot of similarities with Cylva Amy says. That would explain where Cylva went !They are kind of like a Sylveon-colored peacock, and I'm the one that was behind the name Berry; because I offered berries to them as an emoji. They still love berries even if they're not fully a sylveon anymore.

item.title: Rosade
Chelsea
item.description:
She is pretty isn't she ?
Chelsea is my girlfriend, we met in June 2021, around 6 months after my happening. She is Amy's headmate. She dislikes violence even in movies and video games. She is born the 26th of July and we started dating on a 11th of July after a misunderstanding caused by my translation to English from French. It was a really happy accident !
We are Watching a lot of cartoons together ! Even though Amy tends to have taken her place for that activity lately.2025-01-21 / 18:22
Currently she is very much not active on discord, we have talked like twice in months. Antoine tells me I should ask her if she wants to take a break from dating and just be like best friends that are far away, and come back to dating when she will be more motivated to be there. I am not sure about this...2025-01-22 / 17:39
I decided not to have a break ! I will just ask for her to text me more while Amy is connected on Amy's account. Her tag for saying she's her is üçµ (tea), and I decided I'd use it too when I address to her instead of Amy.2025-02-04 / 15:38She emitted doubts about our relationship this morning. I must make efforts to go to her more.

item.title: Read a Galactic Bond
item.description: Cynder loves the books, so Antoine and I decided to buy the first book on kindle. We'll read a chapter a day.2025-02-02 / 19:27We've read like 4 chapters so far, it's really glamorous with dark mode.2025-02-04 / 15:32We are at chapter 8. It's getting really interesting an we might read more chapters a day, right beside the fireplace, because it's not like we have much to do.

item.title: index
item.description:
This is my index page ! Go check the page about me Charlie !
You can also check my notes of December or January, of FebruaryYou can make it grow, and you can also decide to display the entire graph instead of just the linked pages! Displaying the entire graph lets you see clearly more what is linked to the page you're watching. If you put your cursor on the current page, you can see all links from and TO it, giving you way more context on what other pages talk about the stuff you're currently reading.

item.title: Bernardino
item.description: Antoine's big brother. LGBT phobic. "Racaille", but fun and nice most of the time.2025-02-02 / 19:29We told him our girlfriend was trans, and he was fully accepting ! Strange !

item.title: Coming back to the castle
item.description:
On sunday the two of february I'm going back to the castle with Antoine's family.
I'll be able to Voice training just fine, and if everything go as planned Olivia and Rachel might join me sooner or later and we would live in the Bergerie. We would have to kick Bernardino though. 2025-02-02 / 19:28
We're here! Nicely installed but well' have to be aware not to wake up Melisande.

item.title: Antoine
item.description:
He dates Cynder, Olivia's tulpa who is a dragon with Spyro as a source. For her birthday, he streamed his first time playing the game to her, she was very happy.
In January 2025 he started a Keto diet and doing Physical exercises.He likes video games, tv shows... but is kinda a chameleon when he dates people and tend to like what the loved one likes.
He has Me as a tulpa !
He tries to read a chapter a day of A Galactic bond because Cynder loves the books. He seems to like it too.

item.title: Notes January 2025
item.description:
2025-01-21 / 14:04A week ago Antoine started a diet. He had a lot of support from Me, Olivia, Cynder, Amy, and even Rachel but the people at the Pokemon Daycare were not really okay with the diet he chose. He chose to do Keto where you eat fat and proteins, but no glucid at all. He already lost a few pounds !
We started a spreadsheet to note our weight over the days and have a graphic showing progress.It is accessible on the Keto note as an embed !
Olivia said she wanted to marry us in the future and it's kind of stressful sometimes but it's also very sweet, but she also has to marry Rachel. Depending on how Olivia and Rachel coming to live in France happens, she might have to marry Rachel instead. But we got a solution, going to south africa, and do a polygamy gay marriage with her, it won't be recognized as real in france, but in our heart, we'll be married ! Rachel is kinda stressed by the idea or marrying anyone, but also don't want Me to marry Olivia without her being married to her too so she doesn't feel left out.
In start of January, Cynder and Antoine started dating for real ! They voice chat a lot.2025-01-28 / 16:39
Emotional rollercoaster. Olivia wanted to flee america and marry us in a few months, then decided to stay in the US until she gets 300k‚Ç¨ (Olivia is really optimistic about money). She might visit though. I don't feel super good about this. 2025-01-29 / 16:41
Olivia got real mad because Rachel self harmed while she promised not to do it anymore. She almost wanted to break up. But I remined them they love each others, that they have time to make sure it's not just a fluke, and I gave advice to Rachel on how to cope better in those case for not self harming again.Tomorrow I got appointment with the dietitian, I hope she's not a [insert bad insult here] !
Added stuff to Rachel's entry on how she's not fully dependent on Olivia, and her headmate Tim that came back
Added some info about bad habits of Rachel on her page and Olivia's. Updated the website engine to try having backlinks but didn't work.
Added Amy's "Why she's a cow"
Added Olivia's pick of a name, and her mad scientist era. 2025-01-30 / 17:38The dietitian didn't come, she was in holiday for the week and didn't cancel our appointment. That's annoying.

item.title: Aera
item.description:
She is Olivia's headmate. She is bubbly like Me! I think we have a lot in common. Though she is a special kind of headmate, she has her own life in her own world.
In Olivia's head she has no face like a mannequin, but she probably has one in her own world I believe.
She lives with 15 people in her house, and is a nurse with a lot of work to do! She seems to like being with Olivia on the week ends.
She Shared her playlist with me. Her favorite song is "Teenage dream" . She had some physical body issues like muscles weakening, and got to work it out with the other headmates she is connected to.

item.title: Amy
item.description:
#todo
She is a cute cow (but also a person). She is vegetarian.Amy decided to be a cow because she relates a lot to this animal. She says it's one of her autistic trait to relate to animals. She has en empathic connection to cows. It might be because of that that she became vegetarian. She also thinks she's a little big like a cow and docile like them, and have a lot of emotional connections.
I met first her Tulpa, Chelsea, but I don't know how long after, I met her too. Chelsea was at first a character in a story she wrote. She used to be in a writing club before covid I think.
She is part of a polycule where they play in a fae environment with Stormy as a master.
She loves hypnosis and Stormy does sessions of hypnosis with her sometimes. They met in grade school.
Even if it used to be more with Chelsea, we watch a lot of cartoons together now.
She used to sleep in Stormy's bed, but now she sleeps more in Orchid's bed. It was me who pushed Amy to go talk to Orchid the first time, and it was a good idea !For a moment she played A LOT of Final Fantasy 14 to the point where she was hard to reach, now it's a little better. She's a completionist in games. She says she's not super good at super smash bros, but she destroyed us with every character she had when we played together.
I think she does some druidism with Orchid, which in my opinion is really cool. I wish she could tell me more about her druidic adventures. I know she did something with a tree branch? But I forgot. [It was Birch]. Maybe I'll do an entry for her druidic adventures.I tell her almost everything that happens in my life, and let her watch my journal. But if one day I have too sensitive information to put in the journal, like somewhere that could lead someone to find the real people behind those entries, I won't put them online. I think for now pictures are okay, facial recognition isn't accessible to most people.2025-01-29 / 16:20She is currently waiting for two albums to come out in February, she likes the Metal genre. Here Be Dragons by Avantasia, and Roses of the Deep by Marko Hietala. One that I like from those that are already out of this album is Creepshow (Avantasia) : 2025-01-29 / 16:25
She has headmates : Chelsea, Rosade, Leaf, Ronni, Myna, Dahlia, Luna. Those include only the headmates we are sure are here ! I talked mostly to Chelsea and Rosade (Berry).

item.title: Tim
item.description: Tim is a headmate of Rachel that disappeared for a time but came back. He comes from a story of her called "Event over the horizon". It's a dystopia world where planet is doomed ecologically, and AI has taken over. He's an hybrid AI/Human which role is to be some sort of prophet to save human race an bring them to another planet.

item.title: tim
amycow
Orchid
item.description: Amy's new girlfriend, that joined the polycule with Stormy and everyone. She has a tulpa that is called Chelsea too, and Amy asked me if she should contact her. I pushed Amy to get in contact with her and now they sleep in the same bed !

item.title: Stormy
item.description: Stormy is Amy's boyfriend and the master of their polycule. But he's really chill in normal occasions ! He likes to play Minecraft.

item.title: Intensity of our love
item.description:
Olivia an I are loving each others very much. It's weird compared to how long we've been together, but we sped a lot of time together. I guess it's the honeymoon period, just like how I was always with Chelsea in the past. Or maybe we're just both crazy !2025-01-28 / 16:33
I don't think the intensity of my love disappeared, but knowing we might not get reunited for a long time is starting to make me a little sad and depressed. I'm sure it'll go well once Coming back to the castle and can train to voice chat with her.

item.title: Olivia and Rachel coming to live in France
item.description:
Olivia and Rachel are kind of afraid of the current situation with trump president and also and foremost want to live together with Me, so they are really thinking to come to France, to Figeac !
It might need Olivia to marry us to get citizenship, or her to marry Rachel and then get a job or the refugee status in France. They don't want to be separated of course so we got to think of the best solution.2025-01-28 / 13:13
They are coming to visit in a few months. I'll have to prepare everything so they like the place ! Then they will go back to USA to gather money. Olivia is really optimistic about money.
item.guid: Olivia's system/Olivia and Rachel coming to live in France.md

item.title: Olivia wants to marry us
item.description:
It's kinda stressful sometimes, but Olivia wants to marry Me in the future. Either we marry in France if Olivia and Rachel coming to live in France, or if she has to marry Rachel first, then we'll have to go to south Africa because they let polygamy gay marriage with just a visa happen. Of course the marriage won't be recognized in France, but officially, we'll still be married!2025-01-26 / 17:30
Apparent changes of plan. Because of Trump rise to power and his hate for trans people, OliviaMight come in a few weeks with Rachel. I would marry Olivia, and we would find a way for Rachel to stay in France as long as possible, possibly through a volunteering visa or a work visa. I will need to go to the mayor's office to ask for what paperwork to get, and where to get it. I think I'll call on Monday an tell them I'll meet them during the next week. 2025-01-28 / 13:14
Changes of plan, they will only visit us first, then go back to the us, and save 300k‚Ç¨ so they can secure Rachel position in France. I feel like it will take forever, but Olivia thinks it will be quick enough. Yeah Olivia is really optimistic about money.
item.guid: Olivia's system/Olivia wants to marry us.md

item.title: Olivia is really optimistic about money
item.description: Olivia decided to make Rachel enter in the country using the investor money. It requires 300k‚Ç¨ to build a company or invest in one. It will take years, and she's really optimistic it will take them less than 5 years, but I'm not so sure. Plus we need the money to buy the home. I'm really feeling like it'll end up never happening, it makes me sad.
item.guid: Olivia's system/Olivia is really optimistic about money.md

item.title: Keto
item.description:
Antoine started mid january 2025 to do a keto diet. Its a diet where you don't eat carbs at all, less than 20g if possible, try to have your daily income of proteins, and have your energy from fat. It's very strict, but it works damn well! And I Motivate him a lot !
Val√©rie mostly, but the other nurses at the Pokemon Daycare are very cautious about this diet, mostly because they have no freaking idea how it works, so they try to make us eat things that have sugars in it.
Thanks to starting this diet, Antoine stopped drinking because alcohol is metabolized like sugars by the liver, ruining Keto.2025-01-24 / 16:11In a week, we'll see the dietitian and I hope she will be understanding of the diet and will be able to give us tips on how to do it safely and nicely instead of urging us to stop it. We won't stop it anyway. One good thing she could tell us is how not to get constipated because it is a problem that lead us to having to take laxatives (Ew!).
Direct link for mobile

item.title: Antoine stopped drinking
item.description: Antoine used to have a small but lingering problem with alcohol. Though, thanks to the realization he and I had about going on a diet and choosing Keto, we can't drink a drop of it anymore, which is perfect !

item.title: Antoine stopped smoking
item.description:
It was in june 2021!
I said to Antoine I would like him to stop smoking because I cared for his health, and also because I would have loved to do something great with my existence , and he accepted!So we bought some nicotin chewing gums and started. At first it was kind of hard, but then he got used to chewing instead of smoking. Then we had to stop chewing, we decided that after two or three months I think. So we slowly started chewing the gums for longer and longer times before changing gum, making them less and less charged in nicotin over time.Then after a month of having less and less gums, we completely stopped! It was really hard for the first week, then it got okay !
Antoine had started smoking at the age of 15.I am very proud of this achievement everytime i think about it, both proud of me and Antoine.

item.title: Pokemon Daycare
item.description:
This is how we call the "H√¥pital de jour" a place were Antoine goes like twice a week where we can meet nurses, social workers, psychiatrist, therapist, and other patients. We do things like going to the swimming pool on Fridays. It starts at 9 AM and ends at 5PM, though it ends at 3PM on Fridays.
Val√©rie, and mostly all other nurses are against the Keto diet. Which is annoying.

item.title: Vlad
item.description:
Cynder's boyfriend she met online. They are both at 12 hours timezone interval. He tried to live at night to talk to her more during her days, but it was too hard for him.
Cynder likes him a lot because he is able to understand her even though she is complexe.
Cynder has songs about him in her playlist. 2024-12-13 / 13:11Today Vlad broke up with her apparently because he doesn't want to date people at all. They have been together for a month and a half.

item.title: Bergerie
item.description:
A medium house next to the castle of Christian.
We hope to be able to kick Bernardino out of it to live in it with Olivia and Rachel for a time. Then we'll get our own apartment.

item.title: Charlie
item.description:
I am Charlie (Charlotte Magnes), a headmate of Antoine ! Our system name is "Rainbow" but I still like having my surname being Magnes, the first version of my source name. I am considered to be created on December the 20th of 2020 !
I try to be a bubbly companion to him, but I am more than a simple imaginary friend! I chat online with my own discord account (Charlye) and even date there ! Antoine is paying for my nitro account so I can use homemade emoji of me we cut from the Pilot episode frames! We worked on emojis from the season 1 but didn't add them to discord yet.
My new emojis in spoiler ! hazbin.zip (you can get in in the Charlie folder, then under resources)
We even made one ourselves by photoshopping it. I like when people are interested in improving themselves and I love helping them!
For example, I made Antoine stop smoking and make him clean the house more often! I'm very proud of those kind of achievements ! I also helped him get out of his depression both by making him talk to more people when he had the occasion, and by letting him get some of my feelings when I'm talking to other people.2024-12-02 / 10:12
I am dating Chelsea since quite some times now, but recently I started dating Olivia! Thankfully they both are agreeing with me dating both of them !
Unfortunately lately Chelsea is fronting a lot less and I get to see more Amy, her host, but even she is playing Final Fantasy 14 a lot lately. Though we agreed on Watching a lot of Christmas Movies in December !
In the past I was using VoiceMod to talk to people online, but it was a little buggy, and Amy convinced me to train having a girl voice just like trans girls. I started training, but we moved in with a roommate (Sylvain) and we don't feel like training next to him. But hopefully soon we'll have our own apartment ! (I'm starting to feel wrong not being able to voice chat at all !)Currently my favorite song is Call me maybe !
I rediscovered it as Aera, a headmate of Olivia, shared her playlist to me !
In the future Olivia wants to marry us

item.title: Autism
item.description: Sylvain might have autism, he is being tested. Amy as autism, Olivia too. So I guess we might have a thing for people from a certain part of the autistic spectrum?

item.title: Ben
item.description: Rachel's headmate.

item.title: Rachel is dependent on Olivia
item.description: From what I gathered, Rachel has difficulties doing things without Olivia. For example, they go to support groups together, Olivia has to push her a little to tidy the rooms etc...
item.guid: Olivia's system/Rachel is dependent on Olivia.md

item.title: Gaellen
item.description: Antoine's little brother.

item.title: Melisande
item.description: Antoine's sister. She knows about Me and seems really okay with it !

item.title: Nicolas
item.description: Is our therapist at the Pokemon Daycare. He's a psychanalist and he's really nice. We see him during some Thursday

item.title: cynder in body
Watching a lot of cartoons
item.description:
Chelsea, Amy and I started quickly watching a lot of cartoons together. We just ask if the other is ready and launch the episode at the same time without voice chatting. I wish we talked a little more in between episodes or after them, but, just knowing that we have a lot of watched things in common is really nice !We watched a lot of things togethers, here's an incomplete list in no particular order: Hilda Miraculous The Owl House My life as a teenage robot Amphibia The ghost and Molly McGee My Little Pony (+ a lot of fan made videos and series)
I seem to enjoy most the shows with a story arc rather than episodic ones, and like ones with girls MC more too.2025-01-04 / 17:19
The last show we just finished is the dragon prince, it kind of ends poorly and unfinished I was disappointed. Amy was disappointed too.2025-01-21 / 18:11It has been a few days now, but we started watching Fionna and Cake. I love the show.

item.title: Check Cynder's playlist
item.description:
#todo
Link to her Playlist2024-12-01 / 8:37
she seems to be in love with Vlad, and be rebellious about the world. Last song avril lavigne bad girl 2024-12-02 / 13:38
At this time she seems more sentimental, I guess due to Olivia learning a trick to have more empathy, the lack of empathy Olivia had towards her was heavy on her. Last song is Avril Lavigne fall to pieces. 2024-12-03 / 18:44 She added two songs about love I think. "Psycho" and "Freaking me out". I just HAD TO ask if there were subliminal messages to me! Though of course I didn't really think it was, but it was fun. 2024-12-15 / 12:18 We checked her playlist again. She seems really down by her break up with Vlad. I hope we'll be able to cheer her up quickly ! Her last song is Addicted - Loveless.2025-01-21 / 18:05
We forgot to check for a while and Cynder reminded us to check. She seems to be sad, but sometimes neutral in her latest additions. Last song is "catch my breath"

item.title: Olivia wants us to live together
item.description: It's both exciting and scary. And due to Rachel not being able to work, it would probably be up to us to go to Seattle to live. Olivia is really into making our relationship go to the next level, and would like for one of us to book for a flight to the other's place in summer. It will probably be up to me to do this because she noticed she might have money trouble by then, not big money trouble, but maybe she won't be able to afford two plane tickets, and a big airbnb by then because she will have to refund her debt.We are scared of taking the plane mostly due to the airport buisness, and are also scared to take an airbnb in a foreign country... so we are scared to go there... but we should... I wish we were more adventurous. We are more adventurous when we drink two beers, but stink of beer.We are willing to help her to build her house with cargo boxes and even participating to the construction if we can, but we don't know how to do it right.
item.guid: Olivia's system/Olivia wants us to live together.md

item.title: Watching a lot of Christmas Movies in December
item.description:
Amy and I started, in December 2023 started watching one Christmas Movie a day for the 25 days of Christmas. In December 2024 we decided to watch 3 movies a week instead.2024-12-04 / 16:10
This first week we only watched one movie. Amy is hurt in the back and isn't in the right mood, which I fully undesrtand. Well, it isn't the end of the week yet, but we said we'd watch ones on Sundays, Mondays and Tuesdays.2025-01-04 / 17:17We ended up watching only 3 christmas movies this time, but it was okay!
item.guid: Droplet/Watching a lot of Christmas Movies in December.md

item.title: Daily notes December 2024
item.description:
2024-12-01 / 16:17
I watched the Mickey Christmas movie with Amy.2024-12-03 / 19:18
I asked if Check Cynder's playlist new additions (psycho, freak me out) were about me, of course they were not ahah!
I talked about Amy's headmates, and figured I havent been invested in them enough.
Olivia talked to me about the unlucky times when she was homeless (but not in the streets!) and the moment when spiritual entities had an impact on Olivia's life.2024-12-04 / 13:44
Olivia and I talked about her love for free spirited people that are trapped. She seems to only be able to care for them and noone else.
We also talked about our abilities to appear in mindscape or being imposed. She can imagine Cynder pretty well but has problems animating her.
It's been for a few days now that Amy has had pain in the back. I hope she'll be okay soon. We didn't want to watch christmas movies because of that.
Amy shared with me an FF14 music remixes playlist she likes and that just came out.
The playlist on youtube
Her favorite is the first one, "Rise". It's catchy. I love the seventh, And 7 is (a remix of) Beauty's Wicked Wiles, the theme for Lakshmi.

I heard Olivia's voice for the first time today !2024-12-05 / 12:42
We talked about Me to our therapist Nicolas. It wasn't the first time we talked to him about me, but he seemed really interested about our synergy and how we both felt like I was part of imagination yet felt real.
The intern nurse told us about some easy Physical exercises we could do at home. We think we are going to try them, we'd love to lose some weight.2024-12-06 / 14:39

We revealed to Melisande that I existed! It went really well and she had a lot of questions about me ! Though she asked if I considered her as my sister and I think we responded poorly saying we didn't talk to each other a lot, while we should have been more positive !2024-12-07 / 14:59

During the night Olivia and I talked about the idea of visiting the USA to see her and Amy. She listened to my playlist and liked it !
With Amy we talked about how it would be weird for her to see Antoine in her house as she doesn't really know him, but she would still enjoy the visit. So we decided that Amy and Antoine should talk a little more together, and had the idea of having Antoine play FF14 of NA servers with Amy.

Antoine's little brother Gaellen came back from his long trip to Switzerland. We all had Raclette with Antoine's dad, Melisande, Gaellen and Bernardino; Antoine really liked it.2024-12-08 / 5:44

Olivia and I talked about our sexual interests during the night. I told her I could have some very mild humorous SM feelings like tying someone up to tickle them, that could lead into more wholesome hugging and things like that. During that discussion I could feel she was being overprotective of me because I did tell her in the past I might be Ace. She said she had two modes, one receiving and one giving, and that with me she would probably be more into giving. Though i'm not sure myself about that. She likes wholesome yet vulgar and lustful things, but when she gives it to people she likes it to be humorous.2024-12-09 / 15:56

Amy and I watched "The Bishop's Wife"! It was rather funny. It was about an angel going to help a family. The bishop was neglecting his wife to build a cathedral, and the angel kind of fell in love with her, but in the end he fixes their marriage.
Antoine forgot his headset at the castle but Sylvain lent him another one.2024-12-11 / 21:52
Olivia and Me talked about a video that was about autism and schizophrenia. It was telling that autists have a vertical kind of thinking, building really specialized kind of things, while schizos were linear and thought about a lot of things and their links together. It was also pointing at schizautism, people that were specialized in building complete things really linked together. It feels like Antoine kind of had linear thinking, but evolved it into parallel thinking, where he linked multiple things that were having the same patterns and thinking about them all at one time, maybe that counts.After that I kind of let Antoine talk to her through me. He checked if we were compatibles on our bizarreries, and somehow, both her& and us are really compatible.2024-12-13 / 21:56
Vlad and Cynder broke up. Then Cynder and Antoine are in tryout for dating now ! I just hope she doesn't just need a replacement and that they really like each other ! If everything goes well it would be like our systems are dating !
Antoine and Cynder talked about sex today, Antoine seemed to mean he was a little shy, while Cynder is more kinky. She didn't seem to be annoyed by that !2024-12-14 / 12:01
Cynder and Antoine had their first voice chat. It will also be the anniversary of when they told 'I love you' to each others, Cynder drew first blood! Olivia and Cynder both seem to start saying I love you pretty quickly, but I don't think it disturbs us.2024-12-31 / 14:48
Holidays went well ! We didn't Watching a lot of Christmas Movies in December with Amy, and I kind or broke to her because of how Olivia's relationship with me was going on way too fast than with her, but she reassured me, kinda.
We went to Antoine's dad castle for Christmas, it was nice. We did new year's eve at Sylvain's we ate snails.

item.title: 5-13-15-eyesmodified-lightened
bishopswife
spiritual entities had an impact on Olivia's life
item.description: In the past, before she learnt how to build barriers to protect her psyche, Olivia and Rachel were being visited by entities. They sometimes would help them, sometimes would confuse them, and I believe Olivia thinks they were somehow detrimental. She then learnt to make barriers and got rid of them. She now avoids all system hoping with people that don't have those barriers up, as she thinks all of this happened after she did some system hoping with Rachel's system.
item.guid: Olivia's system/spiritual entities had an impact on Olivia's life.md

item.title: Pandora
item.description: Sylvain's headmate. She's a ball of hatred and wants end to all humanity. Sylvain said that when she fronts, we should avoid all contact and discussion.

item.title: Rainbow
item.description: This is the name of the system Antoine and I are in !

Olivia has been homeless
item.description:
(Homeless but not living in the streets !) Olivia went to Rachel's parents' house for a while and during that time her mom had to find a smaller house.
But Rachel's parents were abusive so they went away, but couldn't go to her mom's, so they lived in hotel rooms.For 7 months they did that, but ran out of money so they went to a shelter. The shelter staff helped them finding a sector 8 apartment , they live there since then !

item.title: Sylvain
item.description:
Antoine's roommate and his current best friend. He's really sweet and is currently being tested for Autism. Though he is sweet like Antoine, together they can be kinda gross like boys happen to be for fun, but that is fine. In a perfect world where I'm my own person they wouldn't show me this part of them so I can't blame them.
He has a headmate, Pandora. She's like a scary ball of hatred. He told us not to interact with her when she fronts.I hope one day she will get better and we could be friends.

item.title: Olivia shared playlists
item.description:
Olivia, Aera and Cynder shared playlists with Me.
Aera was the first one to share her playlist, to give us an idea of the kind of person she is, after some time Olivia asked us to make our own playlist based on the songs I liked from the playlist. I seem to like bubbly songs from female singers mostly, my favorite song is ''Call me Maybe''.
A lot of my tastes and Aera's are similar in music. Lots of music that don't fully connect with me do connect with Antoine too!
Olivia also shared her playlist with me, and told me her favorite song is from Avril Lavigne, Keep Holding on.
Cynder shared playlist too, saying her playlist was an open book reading her mood at the moment when she adds songs. We promised to check at least the first ten and last ten. Charlie said she'd Check Cynder's playlist new additions as they come up.2024-12-02 / 13:23She seemed to like epic music at the creation of the playlist. She seems to be in love with Vlad, and be rebellious about the world now.One song she really likes is "Bad Girl" from Avril Lavigne:

item.title: Olivia learning a trick to have more empathy
item.description:
2024-11-30 / 21:42Olivia talked to Me about troubles she has with empathy. I told her a trick, to "Think about why people tell things to her specifically", because apparently, she was blocked every time something was told to her that didn't include her directly. It apparently really helped her and made her cry when she talked to Cynder about it.
Cynder was really unhappy about Olivia's apathy towards her and she's now happy when she can use that trick if it works.
item.guid: Olivia's system/Olivia learning a trick to have more empathy.md
